title: Race to Me
description: Skyler Johnson lives the perfect life.A promising future, endless wealth, and two loving parents.But it’s all a lie.The glass mansion she calls home hides dark, painful truths behind its sparkling exterior. A truth that Skyler wants to break free from, shattering her old life and starting anew the moment her gaze lands on Foster Jennings, an irresistible underground racer.He’ll do anything to free her, and she’ll weather any storm for him.But nothing is ever that simple, is it?
author: H.L. Swan
